Sentencas: A reliability analysis methodology for a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system is presented based on physical modeling and experimental data.
Titulo: Reliability analysis of a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell from a systems engineering perspective

Sentencas: The constructed failure probability function comprises three operation phases: (i) as-fabricated, (ii) start-up, and (iii) constant power generation.
Titulo: Reliability analysis of a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell from a systems engineering perspective

Sentencas: In-house experimental data are used to capture the behavior during start-up and normal operation, including drifts of the operating point due to degradation.
Titulo: Reliability analysis of a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell from a systems engineering perspective

Sentencas: The physics-based model provides a theoretical structure, but alternatives are discussed as well which are particularly suitable for experimentalists.
Titulo: Reliability analysis of a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell from a systems engineering perspective

Sentencas: The failure probability function can be used to calculate the reliability of a multi-stack SOFC system.
Titulo: Reliability analysis of a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell from a systems engineering perspective

Sentencas: The effect of operating stacks under over-load conditions in terms of degradation is discussed.
Titulo: Reliability analysis of a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell from a systems engineering perspective

Sentencas: It is shown that the customized failure probability function better explains the dependency on operating conditions compared to standard parametric distribution functions.
Titulo: Reliability analysis of a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell from a systems engineering perspective

Sentencas: The originality of this work is mainly twofold: first, the construction of the failure probability function of a multi-stack SOFC using experimental data for degradation as well as start-up on a system level; second, the focus on technological implications covered by the methodology.
Titulo: Reliability analysis of a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell from a systems engineering perspective

Sentencas: Hence, this systems engineering methodology aims to provide a process for reliability analysis in which the strength of both approaches are utilized, namely keeping sufficient parameter dependency by means of the physics-based approach together with the simplicity of stochastic methods.
Titulo: Reliability analysis of a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell from a systems engineering perspective

Sentencas: This methodology is not limited to SOFC but may also be applicable to other modular (electrochemical) systems.
Titulo: Reliability analysis of a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell from a systems engineering perspective

Sentencas: Besides references on SOFC from a theoretical and experimental perspective, the extended bibliography also includes references on reliability analysis and engineering design, which may act as a starting point for related system analyses. ?
Titulo: Reliability analysis of a multi-stack solid oxide fuel cell from a systems engineering perspective
